comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: Awesome Donald Trump, another accomplishment while running for President of the USA & Hillary Clinton was attending a concert, makes great sense Hillary.

replies.author: Hayden
replies.text: Now, she sleeping so be very quiet so not to Disturb her anymore then she is!

replies.author: Hayden
replies.text: Millions of Americans who are the 'silent majority' will make their voices heard on election day. In the words of Donald Trump - NEVER LET YOUR ENEMY KNOW YOUR PLANS IN ADVANCE !

replies.author: Hayden
replies.text: We can make this happen if you don't set on your Butts. Vote, Pray and believe in God's Miracle. Use every resource you can to help him. Vote Trump Nov. 8th.
